_header: Lord God Jesu Christ God Almighty / I thank Thee with all…
Subjects: Christ, songs in honour of; thanksgiving
_description: A Thanksgiving to Christ attributed to Rolle — forty-six lines in couplets

Lincoln91.First Lines:
Lorde gode Ihesu cryste godd almyghtyI thanke þe with all my
                    herte hally…
Lincoln91.Last Lines:
…To mende my lyfe & lyfe in clennesÞat I may wonne
                    with þe in blisse Endlesse Amen
Lincoln91.Note: Written two verse lines per line of MS.
Lincoln91.Facsimiles:
Brewer,  Derek Stanley,  and  A. E. B. Owen.  
             “Introduction.” 
             The Thornton Manuscript (Lincoln Cathedral MS. 91).
         London: Scolar Press, 1975.
